commentBody: When I read comments like those in the video, I look at the young boys at my daughter's elementary school and wonder. How can such great little kids turn in to monsters as adults?  But, it's not just men spewing venom. Look at the ire turned on Rachel Roy and, bizarrely, Rachel Ray after Beyoncé's Lemonade dropped. Why are women so quick to condemn the alleged "other woman" instead of going after the Jay-Z's of the world for committing infidelity?
